mapper.insert: insert into scraps (postId, scrappedBlogId, scrappedPostId, scrappedPostTitle, scrappedPostContents) values(#{postId}, #{scrappedBlog.id}, #{scrappedPostId}, #{scrappedPostTitle}, #{scrappedPostContents})
mapper.select: SELECT postId, scrappedBlogId as "scrappedBlog.id", scrappedPostId, scrappedPostTitle, scrappedPostContents FROM scraps where postId = #{postId}
